Hi,

I landed on the Mun and drove a rover with 2 Kerbals around on an external seat when it started to tumble over and over madly, after it stopped the Kerbals couldn't move or do anything, i couldn't control them or turn there helmet light on or off and i cant seem to fix it the jet pack wouldn't work either of the rover brakes. Their heads were stuck looking down and didn't move. Can anyone help how to fix it, i don't really want to restart the mission.

Thx

Take a look through the Cross-Platform Issues Thread, specifically "Frozen or Stuck Kerbals on EVA." If you forget where that thread is, there's a link in the Known Issues & Self Help thread in the Support (unmodded installs) forum.
